Text: Re Your tripHow was it Original Message From Ruscitti Kevin Kevin NRONcom To Dan Sweetser Sent Wednesday August AM Subject Read A dose of reality re child rearing Your message To Ruscitti Kevin Subject A dose of reality re child rearing Sent Tue Jul was read on Wed Aug This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

A dose of reality re child rearingTJ Let me let you in on a little secret my man you aint gettin no break from the Luke man when pops out nor are you getting a break from Luke andor Daniel Jr when no is born There are no breaks to be had in the parenting arena for about years Point It pains me so to make this statement but Stamas might actually be able to beat me in basketball now since I have no cartilage in my left knee The Dr says that my running days are over which was obviously a serious blow to my lifestyle but more importantly he said that my organized hoop days are history too This is not to say that I cant contribute the next time that we conduct a demonstration of our skills while hung over at the Charlotte Y but it aint looking good for me ever swatting Stamas ugly jumper into that pretty boy face of his ever again Then again Im crippled not dead Certainly elevation is not required to stuff him so maybe I will Go Sooners Sweets Original Message From To Sent Tuesday July PM Subject Hello from the Left Coast Hey Everyone It has been all too long since we have caught up I thought I would at least try and bridge the gap with a few mugshots of Luke via the internet Lukes doing great Rena is doing great only days until Baby J We are very excited and cant wait until Luke is a big brother At least that way maybe he will give us a break Hope everyones summer is going well We look forward to seeing you all soon Come visit us here in sunny So Cal All the best Todd Rena and Luke See attached file LukesaRunnerJPGSee attached file LukeandMommyJPG
